name: HENTAI ARENA HOLY PUSSY
description:
In your hands is power, protect your kingdom from a horde of monsters. You are the queen of bikini, save your kingdom from monsters.
You have 4 types of weapons:
  • Pistol
  • Tompson
  • AK-74
  • FN SCAR
Monsters appear every 1 second, the delay between the waves is 5 seconds! There are 5 types of monsters, each of them is different in appearance and its own characteristics. Your goal is to kill as many monsters as possible.
